Q: Will there be features added in the future? A: Looking into it! Q: Will this app be on iOS soon? A: Unfortunately not at the moment, but it will be considered if demand is high enough. Q: Is this app open source? A: Yes! This is a non-profit, open source app. Developers can go to this link below for more information. https://github.com/rjsuzuki/transit-app Q: What if I found a problem? A: If you have found an application problem that you would like to report, please click the button just below and send us an email :)
Please be aware that BART schedules and real time estimates may differ. Accuracy relies on BART\'s system and therefore may not always be exact. As a precaution, we encourage you to get to the platform at least a few minutes ahead of schedule. \n We apologize in advanced if this causes any inconveniences.

News - Beginning on February 11, 2019, BART\'s start of service will shift from 4 am to 5 am system wide for a massive project that will seismically retrofit the Transbay Tube. Developer Update BART\'s system update on February 11th, caused a few bugs. We have since fixed them and apologize for any inconveniences.
